Summary: Hovered above neighbors swing set, silently, red, then exponentially took off into the sky until it appeared as a white dot
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Traverse City
There were no other sightings in Traverse City on or around July 24th 2001
divs: Sighting DetailsAt my house on the deck. I walked onto my deck preparing for a birthday party. I thought it was apart of the swing set until i noticed something hovering above. it wasw red like the swing set. A friend and I stared at it until it took off into the distance silently slowly started then almost at the speed of light until it faded into a white dot.
